TI_TEXT.P: Стоматологични услуги и свързани с тях услуги
Zubní lékařství a související služby
Behandling hos praktiserende tandlæger og hermed beslægtet virksomhed
Dienstleistungen von Zahnarztpraxen und zugehörige Dienstleistungen
Οδοντιατρικές και συναφείς υπηρεσίες
Dental practice and related services
Servicios de odontología y servicios conexos
Hambaravipraksis ja vastavad teenused
Hammashoitopalvelut ja niihin liittyvät palvelut
Services de soins dentaires et services connexes
Dental practice and related services
Usluge zubarskih ordinacija i srodne usluge
Fogorvosi és ezzel kapcsolatos szolgáltatások
Servizi di gabinetti odontoiatrici e servizi affini
Stomatologijos praktika ir kitos susijusios paslaugos
Stomatoloģijas prakses un saistītie pakalpojumi
Servizzi tal-prattika dentali u dawk relatati
Tandartspraktijk en aanverwante diensten
Usługi stomatologiczne i podobne
Serviços de medicina dentária e serviços conexos
Servicii de practică dentară şi servicii conexe
Služby zubnej lekárskej praxe a súvisiace služby
Storitve zobozdravniških ordinacij in z njimi povezane storitve
Tandläkarvård och tillhörande tjänster

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: NHS Wales Shared Services Partnership hosted by Velindre NHS Trust

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: NHS Wales Shared Services Partnership hosted by Velindre NHS Trust
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Procurement Services, 4th Floor, Companies House, Crown Way

SHORT_DESCR.P: Hywel Dda University Health Board (HDUHB) is seeking to commission high quality NHS dental services to be delivered in primary care settings for patients across Carmarthenshire, Ceredigion and Pembrokeshire.
This tender will be published in accordance with the Light Touch Regime of the EU Procurement Regulations 2015.

Hywel Dda University Health Board (HDUHB) is seeking to commission high quality NHS dental services to be delivered in primary care settings for patients across Carmarthenshire, Ceredigion and Pembrokeshire. Contracts would be offered under the terms of the National Health Service (Personal Dental Services Agreements) (Wales) Regulations 2006. Providers must therefore meet all the legal requirements of the Personal Dental Services (PDS) contract and have recent demonstrable experience of successful delivery of NHS dental services.

INFO_ADD.P: The purpose of this lot is to commission additional Units of Dental Activity in the Llandovery locality.

TITLE.P: Out of Hours Services - South Cerdigion to Cardigan, Lampeter & New Castle Emlyn

INFO_ADD.P: The purpose of this lot is to commission additional Units of Dental Activity for out of hours services in the area of South Cerdigion to Cardigan, Lampeter & New Castle Emlyn.
The Contracting Authority will not accept ITT submissions after the stated closing date.
All tender costs and liabilities incurred by bidders shall be the sole responsibility of the bidders.
The Contracting Authority reserves the right to establish the Contract in whole or in part.
The Contracting Authority reserves the right to annul the tendering process and not establish the Contract.
All documents to be priced in GBP and all payments made in GBP.

To complete your formal proposal, in this notice, please access the ITT via the Bravo E Tender Wales portal where you will find a full suite of tender documentation, reference — PRO-OJEULT-38093 as per the instructions below:
1. Register your company on the eSourcing portal (this is only required once)
— Browse to the eSourcing portal: https://etenderwales.bravosolution.co.uk/ and click the link to register,
— Accept the terms and conditions and click "continue",
— Enter your correct business and user details,
— Note the username you chose and click "save" when complete,
— You will shortly receive an email with your unique password (please keep this secure).
2. Express an Interest in the tender
— Login to the portal with the username/password,
— Click the "ITTs open to all suppliers" link,
— Click on the relevant ITT to access the content,
— Click the "express interest" button at the top of the page,
— This will move the ITT into your "my ITTs" page. (this is a secure area reserved for your projects only).
—You can now access any attachments by clicking "buyer attachments" in the " ITT details" box.
3. Responding to the tender
— Click "my response" under "ITT details", you can choose to "create response" or to "decline to respond" (please give a reason if declining).
— You can now use the "messages" function to communicate with the buyer and seek any clarification,
— Note the deadline for completion, then follow the onscreen instructions to complete the ITT,
— There may be a mixture of online & offline actions for you to perform (there is detailed online help available).
You must then submit your reply using the "submit response" button at the top of the page.
If you require any further assistance please consult the online help, or contact the eTendering Helpdesk on 08003684852.
